prodNameC: 戴思林快速人類自體抗體免疫試驗系統
prodNameE: ANA FastTM: Indirect Fluorescent Antibody kit
ingredientsDesc: Substrate Slides:Each HEp-2 well slide contains HEp-2 cell grown and fixed on the slide.Fluorescent Antibody Conjugate:Goat or rabbit (see vial label) anti-human immunoglobulin conjugated with fluroescein isothiocyanate (FITC). Evans Blue is added as a counterstain.ANA (Homogeneous) Positive Control Serum:Ready to use human serum in dropper vial containing antinuclear antibodies demonstrating a strong homogeneous staining reaction on HEp-2 cells.ANA (Homogeneous) Endopint Reference Control Serum:Ready to use human serum in dropper vial containing antinuclear antibodies demonstrating a minimal homogeneous staining reaction on HEp-2 cells.Autoantibody Negative Control Serum:Ready to use human serum in dropper vial containing no detectable autoantibodies. Sodium azide 0.1% is added as a presercative.PBS:Contains dry granular phosphate buffered saline blend.Mounting Medium:Ready to use dropper vial. Contains phosphate buffered glycerolBlotting Strips
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區福德三路369號12樓
efficacy: 此ANAFASTTM 測試系統是利用組織培養作為樣本，由間接免疫螢光抗體法來檢測以及滴定分析循環在人體血清之抗核抗體(ANA)。
